title: Megan Hilty and Jessie Mueller hit the red carpet at the premiere of Patsy & Loretta
text:
Megan Hilty and Jessie Mueller were all smiles on the red carpet of their new llifetime movie premiere, Patsy & Loretta.

The 38 year old Hilty and 36 year old Mueller were rocking slightly matching black ensembles at the New York premiere, held at Carnegie Hall on Monday night.

The upcoming TV movie is slated to premiere Saturday, October 19, at 8pm ET/PT on Lifetime.

Stars: Megan Hilty and Jessie Mueller were all smiles on the red carpet of their new llifetime movie premiere, Patsy & Loretta

Hilty was wearing a satin low-cut black top that was tucked into black pants for her red carpet look.

The Broadway beauty wore her blonde hair down, with glittering diamond earrings dangling from her ears.

She completed her look with a black clutch which she held onto while walking the red carpet on Monday night, and she was also seen posing with her co-star and husband, Brian Gallagher.

Mueller was wearing a stylish patterned black pantsuit with a small necklace dangling around her neck seen through the plunging neckline.

The actress wore matching black pants and black pumps for her outing, plus silver hoop earrings.

Mueller posed with her co-stars Hilty and Janine Turner (Hilda Hensley), Joe Tippett (Doolittle Lynn) and director Callie Khouri (Thelma & Louise).

Patsy and Loretta recounts the untold friendship between country music legends Patsy Cline (Megan Hilty) and Loretta Lynn (Jessie Mueller).

When they first met, Cline was already one of country music's biggest stars, while Lynn was just a coal miner's daughter with a cheap guitar.

Cline took Lynn under her wing and helped her succeed in Nashville, as they became touring partners and close friends.

Cline died tragically in a plane crash at the age of 30, but Lynn continued on to a legendary career, known to this day as the First Lady of Country Music.

The film is produced by the daughters of both the film's subjects, Loretta Lynn's daughter Pasty Lynn Russell and Patsy Cline's daughter Julie Fudge on behalf of Patsy Cline's Estate.
